fields.name: Supplier Part Number
column(s): [1224 - Sheets And Sheet Se....xlsx]'1224 - Sheets And Sheet Se...'!C
[2239 - Blankets And Throws.xlsx]'2239 - Blankets And Throws'!C
[1226 - Bath Rugs  Mats.xlsx]'1226 - Bath Rugs  Mats'!C
fields.html_description:
Description
Must be less than 64 characters and must be a unique value. This is the value as it appears on your Inventory Feed and Purchase Orders. If project is a line update, the format of the part number must match the format of the previous line additions. All text and/or numbers accepted. Try to avoid leading zero's, as this can cause recognition errors, due to formatting issues. Please click on column header for more info.

Enter in the shipping weight (lbs) of this carton.

Description
Enter in the shipping height of the respective product in packaging. If the product ships in more than three boxes, this would be the height of the additional box(es).

Description
Enter in the UPC (Universal Product Code) for the respective product. If the UPC starts with a 0, make sure the 0 is not being removed from the column due to column format. It should be exactly 12 digits long.

fields.name: Carton Width
fields.html_description:

Enter in the shipping width of the respective product in packaging. If the product ships in more than three boxes, this would be the width of the additional box(es).

The Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN ) is a 10-character alphanumeric unique identifier assigned by Amazon.com and its partners for product identification within the Amazon organization.

fields.html_description:
Description
Please do not use abbreviations. Try to include the Product Type in the name, such as Bed, Lamp or Rug, for example. Avoid any option specific information such as its colour or size. 150 character limit Enter the name of the product. Use 'Title Case', i.e. Begin each word with a capital letter (except "with", "the", "and", etc.) Please click on column header for more info.

fields.html_description:
Description
A short product description highlighting details about key product information. Copy should be complete sentences (between 100 and 200 words) and describe between 2 to 5 benefits of the product that could not be summarized in a bullet point. Enter text here. Please use 'Sentence case', i.e. Capitalize the beginning of sentences ONLY. Please see column header for description.

fields.html_description:
Description
Does this product and/or packaging have additional advertising or labeling details regarding claims about the product’s origin? Please use this field to provide a qualified or unqualified claim regarding the product origin in accordance with US Federal Trade Commission (FTC) and Canada Competition Bureau regulations. Additionally, if applicable, please use this field to communicate any appropriate qualified, comparative, or descriptive claims regarding the origin of the product. Examples include, but are not limited to, communicating relevant percentage of domestic and non-domestic content (ex: 60% U.S. Content), communicating the origin of certain components of the product (ex: "Hand carved in U.S. — Wood from Philippines"), or communicating where the product was assembled (Ex: “Assembled In Mexico”). See https://www.ftc.gov/tips-advice/business-center/guidance/complying-made-usa-standard#qualified and https://www.competitionbureau.gc.ca/eic/site/cb-bc.nsf/eng/03169.html

fields.name: Quilt/Coverlet/Bedspread Included
fields.html_description:
Description
Does this set include a Quilt/Coverlet/Bedspread? Traditionally composed of three layers of fiber, quilts consist of a woven cloth top, a layer of batting and a woven back, all stitched together in decorative patterns. Quilts are usually made from cotton or cotton blends and are lightweight, thus perfect for summer use or as a winter topper with blankets underneath.​ A coverlet is smaller than a bedspread but larger than a standard blanket, a coverlet grazes the space where your mattress meets your bed frame and, when tucked in with the rest of your bedding, lends a tailored, modern vibe. Since its small-footprint styling is versatile, it can also be left untucked for a slightly more relaxed look, or even folded at the foot of the bed as you would a light blanket.

fields.name: Fill Weight (Oz)
fields.html_description:
Description
Please only include the numerical value of the fill weight. Fill weight is the fill material's weight measured in ounces. Typically, the higher the fill weight, the heavier the product.

fields.name: Fill Power
fields.html_description:
Description
Please only include the numerical value of the fill power. Fill power is a measure of the loft or "fluffiness" of a down product that is loosely related to the insulating value of the down. The higher the fill power the more air an ounce of the down can trap, and thus the more insulating ability an ounce of the down will have.

  • Egyptian Certified Cotton
  • Standard Cotton
